entries.meaning: (dated outside US) A vessel used to boil water for tea or other hot beverages.

verbs.description: teakettle (third-person singular simple present teakettles, present participle teakettling, simple past and past participle teakettled)

entries.meaning: (intransitive, rare) To make a shrill sound like a boiling teakettle.
examples: The Carolina wrens love it too, and they were teakettling away around me.
